bio: Senior Computer Science student at CSI with extensive experience in software engineering internships. Built real-time distributed data pipelines, led teams on AI-driven projects, and developed full-stack applications. Passionate about building impactful solutions and exploring new technologies.
personalStatement: Throughout my journey at CSI, I've had the privilege of working with cutting-edge technologies like Elixir, Apache Kafka, and GraphQL while building systems that process billions of dollars in transactions. From leading engineering teams to developing AI-driven solutions, I'm passionate about creating scalable systems that make a real impact.
careerGoals: Seeking software engineering position working on distributed systems, data engineering, or AI-driven applications where I can leverage my experience in building scalable backend architectures.

projects.title: Interactive Card Simulation Game
projects.description: Web-based card game simulation featuring dynamic gameplay mechanics, responsive design, and interactive UI elements. Built with modern JavaScript and deployed on Vercel for seamless performance and user experience.

projects.title: TheraMotive Insurance Intake System
projects.description: End-to-end insurance intake system with AI-driven features for text summarization and OCR. Led a team of 8 interns to build and deploy the system on AWS with automated email notifications and PPI redaction for secure healthcare data processing.

projects.title: 24m√∂bler Inventory Management System
projects.description: Backend server for real-time inventory management and order processing. Directed infrastructure decisions focusing on system scalability, deployment, and security for high-traffic e-commerce operations with automated stock tracking.

projects.title: CUNY Tech Prep Data Science Projects
projects.description: Technical projects developed during prestigious data science fellowship using Python, Jupyter Notebooks, Pandas, NumPy, and Scikit-learn. Focused on exploratory data analysis, feature engineering, and big data handling with machine learning model development.

projects.title: StudentsWhoCode MERN Platform
projects.description: Full-stack MERN application developed as part of a 6-person engineering team. Built responsive React UIs and RESTful APIs with Node.js/Express to manage and display MongoDB data with real-time updates and user authentication features.
